choices.name: chc_RequestEvent_Confirmation_Yes
choices.choiceText: Yes, this request is for a Corporate Account or an MLA opportunity over $2M (FS) or $5M (PKG)

choices.name: chc_RequestEvent_Type_Field
choices.choiceText: Field - Field Sales (including MLA opportunities under $2M (FS) or $5M (PKG))

choices.name: chc_RequestEvent_Type_Strategic
choices.choiceText: Strategic - Corporate accounts and MLA opportunities over $2M (FS) or $5M (PKG)

decisions.description: Determines if the variable string contains values to parse
decisions.name: dec_RequestEvent_ParseValues
decisions.label: Parse Values

decisions.description: Determines the path, based on the user input in the previous screen
decisions.name: dec_RequestPath
decisions.label: Request Path

decisions.description: Determines if the variable string contains values to parse
decisions.name: dec_StratAccts_ParseValues
decisions.label: Parse Values

decisions.description: Determines which users or groups to send an email alert
decisions.name: dec_StratAccts_Qualified_EmailAlertGroup
decisions.label: Email Alert Group

decisions.description: Determines if Files were uploaded in the previous screen
decisions.name: dec_StratAccts_Qualified_FilesUploaded
decisions.label: Files Uploaded

Flow.description: Used to initiate a Work Order request that confirms whether the request should be handled as either a Corporate or Field Sourcing request. This is only available from the Opportunity. This Flow uses a subflow to call the 'Work Order [SF] Sourcing Work Order Creation' Flow if the request should be going through the process previously built to handle Field Sourcing requests.

formulas.description: Calculates the hyperlink to be used in the Text Template resource
formulas.name: fx_StratAccts_Hyperlink

formulas.description: Calculates the score to be used for qualification
formulas.name: fx_StratAccts_Score

formulas.description: Based on the calculated score, determines the Status value to be used when creating the Work Order record
formulas.name: fx_StratAccts_ScoreStatus

Flow.label: Work Order - Initial Sourcing Request from Opportunity

recordCreates.description: Creates a Work Order record that has been determined to be a Strategic Accounts Sourcing Work Order
recordCreates.name: crt_StratAccts_Qualified_WorkOrder
recordCreates.label: Work Order

recordCreates.description: Creates File (ContentDocumentLink) linked records to relate the uploaded File(s) to the Work Order
recordCreates.name: File_Links
recordCreates.label: File Links

recordLookups.description: Gets the Opportunity record that was used to launch the Flow
recordLookups.name: get_Opportunity
recordLookups.label: Opportunity

recordLookups.description: Gets the new Work Order record that was created
recordLookups.name: get_StratAccts_Qualified_NewWorkOrder
recordLookups.label: New Work Order

recordLookups.description: Gets the Queue Id for the Strategic Accounts team
recordLookups.name: get_StratAccts_QueueId
recordLookups.label: Queue Id

recordLookups.description: Gets the record type ID for to be used for a Strategic Account Work Order
recordLookups.name: get_StratAccts_RecordType
recordLookups.label: Record Type

recordUpdates.description: Update the Strategic Opportunity checkbox when a qualified RFP or RFQ is created
recordUpdates.name: Strategic_on_Opp_is_True
recordUpdates.label: Strategic on Opp is True

screens.description: Prompts user to select the path to follow for the appropriate request
screens.name: scn_RequestEvent
screens.label: Request Event

fields.name: ipt_RequestEvent_Selection
fields.fieldText: What type of sourcing event is being requested?

fields.name: ipt_RequestEvent_Confirmation
fields.fieldText: Please confirm this request meets the following criteria

fields.name: ipt_RequestEvent_OppyAmount
fields.fieldText: What is the value of the sourcing request for this opportunity?

screens.description: Notifies user the request qualified and provides additional information
screens.name: scn_StratAccts_Qualified
screens.label: Qualified Message

fields.name: txt_StratAccts_Qualified_Message
fields.fieldText:
Your request has qualified for the the Strategic Accounts team to assist.

You will receive a confirmation email with this information, for your reference.


{!ipt_StratAccts_RequestTypeChoice.value} Work Order# {!get_StratAccts_Qualified_NewWorkOrder.WorkOrderNumber}

screens.description: Qualifying questions the user must answer to score the request to be used later in the Flow
screens.name: scn_StratAccts_QualifyingScreen
screens.label: Qualifying Questions

value.stringValue: What is the sourcing event request type?

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_BidType
fields.fieldText: What is the bid type?
fields.helpText: To select multiple values, hold ctrl+click

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_BidValueNewShare
fields.fieldText: What is the bid value of new/share business?
fields.helpText: New customer or expanding share of wallet business

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_BidValueDefending
fields.fieldText: What is the bid value of defending business?
fields.helpText: Existing business on existing customer

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_CustomerRequestedCompleteDate
fields.fieldText: What is the customer requested complete date?

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_PortalSubmission
fields.fieldText: Does this request require a portal submission?

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_URLportal
fields.fieldText: What is the portal URL address?
fields.helpText: Please use a valid URL format (eg: https://www.siteaddress.com). 255 character limit.

value.stringValue: Which Product Categories apply to this request?

fields.name: sxn_StratAccts_QualifyingSection
fields.fieldText: Qualifying Questions

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_ReviewedAndApprovedByLeadership
fields.fieldText: Has this been reviewed and approved by your direct / Sales leadership?
fields.helpText: If third party fees, must be pre-approved

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_ExistingBusinessRelationship
fields.fieldText: Do we have an existing business relationship, direct knowledge of contact and business, or access to the C-level?

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_BusinessEventDrivingRequest
fields.fieldText: Do we know what business event is driving this request?

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_DefendingBusinessWithThisRequest
fields.fieldText: Are we defending business with this request?

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_MeetRequestRequirements
fields.fieldText: Can we meet the request requirements?

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_VeritivAcceptsTerms
fields.fieldText: Is Veritiv willing to accept the requested terms?
fields.helpText: Pricing terms, delivery needs, etc. If there are T&Cs required to quote, legal review is needed before proceeding.

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_SufficientInformationProvided
fields.fieldText: Has sufficient usage information and/or detailed specs necessary to quote been provided? If not, can we acquire additional information?

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_ValuePropositionFit
fields.fieldText: Does this opportunity fit our ability to sell our value proposition?

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_InOurKeyVerticals
fields.fieldText: Is this opportunity in one of our key Verticals?
fields.helpText: Heavy MFG, Light MFG, Food & Beverage, Entertainment & Hospitality, Healthcare, Logistics, Office Like, Wholesale/Retail, Government

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_LocationUSorMexico
fields.fieldText: Are the customer locations majority US & Mexico?

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_ProductsInOurCore
fields.fieldText: Are the majority of the products within our core? If not, can we quote subs?

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_HaveOrderAndDeliveryMetrics
fields.fieldText: Do we have the information to determine order & delivery metrics?

fields.name: ipt_StratAccts_Comments
fields.fieldText: Comments

value.stringValue: Please upload at least one file

screens.description: Screen to notify the user the request did not score high enough to qualify
screens.name: scn_StratAccts_Unqualified
screens.label: Unqualified Message

fields.name: txt_StratAccts_Unqualified_Message
fields.fieldText:
Your request does not meet the minimum requirements to qualify for the Strategic Accounts team to assist.

Please work with your management team to obtain additional information in order to qualify your opportunity and then re-submit your request.

subflows.description: Calls the 'Work Order - [SF] Sourcing Work Order Creation' Flow for Field Sourcing requests
subflows.name: sub_FieldSourcingWOFlow
subflows.label: Field Sourcing WO Creation

textTemplates.description: Received an error that the text in the body below exceeded 255 characters when attempting to use as a label in a picklist, although it does not. This template was created to circumvent that issue.
textTemplates.name: tmp_RequestCriteriaNo
textTemplates.text: No, this request is not for a Corporate Account and not an MLA opportunity over $2M (FS) or $5M (PKG). I would like to create a Field opportunity Work Order instead.

textTemplates.name: tmp_StratAccts_EmailTemplate
textTemplates.text:
The following {!ipt_StratAccts_RequestTypeChoice.value} Work Order request has been created. Please click the button below to view the record in Salesforce.

Account: {!get_StratAccts_Qualified_NewWorkOrder.Account.Name}
Opportunity: {!get_StratAccts_Qualified_NewWorkOrder.Opportunity_del__r.Name}
Segment: {!get_StratAccts_Qualified_NewWorkOrder.Segment__c}
Sourcing Product Category: {!get_StratAccts_Qualified_NewWorkOrder.Prod_Categories__c}

  {!get_StratAccts_Qualified_NewWorkOrder.WorkOrderNumber}

textTemplates.description: Email template to be used to send an email to the submitter
textTemplates.name: tmp_StratAccts_EmailTemplateCLASSICSSTYLE
textTemplates.text:
The following {!ipt_StratAccts_RequestTypeChoice.value} Work Order request has been created.


Account: {!get_StratAccts_Qualified_NewWorkOrder.Account.Name}

Opportunity: {!get_StratAccts_Qualified_NewWorkOrder.Opportunity_del__r.Name}

Segment: {!get_StratAccts_Qualified_NewWorkOrder.Segment__c}

Sourcing Product Category: {!get_StratAccts_Qualified_NewWorkOrder.Prod_Categories__c}


Work Order Number: {!get_StratAccts_Qualified_NewWorkOrder.WorkOrderNumber}

variables.description: Stores the list of Content Document Ids that were uploaded
variables.name: col_StratAccts_ContentDocumentIdsUploadedTextCollection

variables.description: Stores the list of email address recipients to be used in the email alert action
variables.name: col_StratAccts_Qualified_EmailRecipientCollection

variables.description: Stores Product Category values from the Opportunity to present to user to include/exclude in the screen multi-select picklist
variables.name: var_ProdCats_DelimitedList

variables.description: Stores the new Work Order record that was created
variables.name: var_StratAccts_NewWO

variables.description: Stores the Work Order record variables to be used in the Flow
